title: Fun on foot
creator_credit: National Hiking and Ski Touring Association, I.M.S., Bjorn Kjellstrom, Helene Huculak, Paul Franklin, Jim Harmon and John King
brief_description: A concept montage film on feet in action. From bush-walking to running to skipping and dancing - a tribute to feet and where they’re going. Produced in support of the Fun on Foot program.
creator_credit_for_label: National Hiking and Ski Touring Association, I.M.S., Bjorn Kjellstrom, Helene Huculak, Paul Franklin, Jim Harmon and John King
